casebody.data:
Thursday, September 10, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

97-1831. Leber v. Buckeye Union Ins. Co.

Erie App. No. E-96-014. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Erie County. Upon consideration of appellee’s motion for continuance of oral argument, IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for continuance of oral argument currently scheduled for September 15,1998, be, and hereby is, granted.

Resnick, J., not participating.
